full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Addition/Renovation Project in Pinehouse, Saskatchewan

#### Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify

Solicitation Number: M5000-23-2145/A

Published Date: 2023-07-05

Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-20T16:00:00

### Project Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites interested contractors to complete an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for the Addition/Renovation Project in Pinehouse, Saskatchewan. 

**Project Description:** 

The project involves full construction services to construct an 80 m² addition, partially renovate an existing building, and conduct site development. Key aspects of the project include:

- Constructing a non-combustible addition for new garage and cold storage on new foundations.
- Demolishing and renovating existing rooms to accommodate new secure storage areas, contained use areas, and support spaces.
- Conducting cosmetic upgrades to existing contained use areas.
- Constructing associated structural, mechanical, and electrical systems to suit the addition and renovations.
- Performing site development, which includes constructing a new 112 m² fenced gravel compound, relocating existing garage structures, and installing new sidewalks, gravel paving, and grading.

**Requirements and Evaluation Criteria:** 

Contractors must meet the mandatory requirements outlined in the Request for Qualifications (RFQ) and submit their qualifications by the tender closing date. The RCMP will pre-qualify bidders based on these requirements. Qualified bidders will then be invited to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

**Additional Project Information:**

- The project is subject to the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
- The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime and will apply its provisions in this procurement.
- The successful contractor will be required to perform the work by 20 December 2024.

### Contact Information:

For further information and to download the RFQ documents, please visit the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders).
